title: message-service
text: Purposefully insecure RestAPI / Frontend demonstrating XSS-, SQL-Injection, Man-in-the-middle-vulnerabilities.

title: Newsbot (2020)
text: Telegram Bot for RSS-Feeds, Reminders, etc.

title: Orchid (2020; Abandoned)
text: Generalization of the Newsbot. Media routing service for arbitrary endpoints.

title: yaylist (2019)
text: Download songs from a Spotify Playlist via youtube-dl.

title: latin-glossary-creator
text: Small tool for creating HTML glossaries for latin texts
